flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: The idea of ME-KIT is to provide an affordable way to control an experiment remotely.
guide.introduction_rendered: The idea of ME-KIT is to provide an affordable way to control an experiment remotely.
guide.summary: A kit consisting of an Arduino board, a motor shield, 2 motors and a temperature sensor on the hardware side and a web interface (built with Google Web Toolkit, GWT) on the software side.
guide.title: ME-KIT (Mobile Experimenting Kit)
